The CEO signed a critical message using an insecure low-exponent RSA signature. Can you forge a valid signature for 0x49f14402c4aad089999c0905c3233da4a48384a69ad4cbc2551a78c8095e4cf9eecef9326bc5580c306d449aaffa61b77a0517ed53a984165b8bd7736711e7c8?

Public Key (n, e): (6370545112560758100635199827018864962409014991425241559452489366525147339469526210716116985686334744581606951863657601306504298809353520103332414736677641, 3)

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{ovpl6tu3}
ciphertext: 0x49f14402c4aad089999c0905c3233da4a48384a69ad4cbc2551a78c8095e4cf9eecef9326bc5580c306d449aaffa61b77a0517ed53a984165b8bd7736711e7c8
cipher: RSA Low-Exponent Signature
hint: What happens when you cube small numbers? Remember e=3!
necessary_info: Public Key (n, e): (6370545112560758100635199827018864962409014991425241559452489366525147339469526210716116985686334744581606951863657601306504298809353520103332414736677641, 3)
